page.title: 13AMENITIES AND TRADE
page.content:
{AMENITIES {Medical/Social}- no facilities in the village - nearest at Lutterworth {Social/Welfare Offices}in Leicester and Lutterworth. Meals on wheels on Tuesdays and Thursdays through W.V.S. {Police} -twice daily patrol in village {Library}-mobile van visits fortnightly
{TRADE} There are two{general stores}one with a post office ( post is collected twice a day ) and one with an off licence. There are two{public houses, The Cave Arms a thatched timber building ( Circa. 1650 AD ) is a free house and is named after the Cave family of Stanford Hall. The Chequers is owned by the Ind Coope Brewery. {Visiting tradesmen} are two dairies, a baker, a greengrocer, a fishmonger and a mobile fast food outlet.
